posts.summary: Hi, I'm trying to do a 2 piston steam engine that is able to make a wheel roll in it's own axis. I'm having some trouble with...
posts.question: Hi, I'm trying to do a 2 piston steam engine that is able to make a wheel roll in it's own axis. I'm having some trouble with the design, I don't completely understand how it works, could you give me a hand?
posts.answer: You seem to have me confused with someone who actually knows what he’s doing…

reblog.comment: You seem to have me confused with someone who actually knows what he’s doing…

trail.content_raw: You seem to have me confused with someone who actually knows what he’s doing…
trail.content: You seem to have me confused with someone who actually knows what he’s doing…
